10346640-ac26-483a-bd32-b4071d718ffd.description: Earners of the Smarsh Enterprise Conduct Specialist designation have a fundamental understanding of the Enterprise Conduct interface, they have developed the skills required to review communications. They have demonstrated the ability to search for, find, review and action employee communications that are potential violations. They are competent in exporting communications to support the review process of employee communications.
10346640-ac26-483a-bd32-b4071d718ffd.name: Smarsh Certified Enterprise Conduct Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Smarsh Enterprise Conduct Specialist course or obtain the same level of experience via self-study and hands-on experience.

ccfa976f-8e03-402f-a211-a0debe44651e.description: Earners of the Smarsh Vantage Server Basic Reviewer designation have a fundamental understanding of the Vantage Server Basic Reviewer interface, they have developed the skills required to create information leak prevention rules and policies. fa7f8328-f3d5-4704-8e1b-7d9a9a75b9c2.description: Earners of the Smarsh Professional Archive Administrator designation have a fundamental understanding of the Professional Archive interface, they have developed the skills required to configure and manage their Professional Archive environment. They have developed the skills required to manage custom tags, policies, groups, user access as well as roles. They can manage saved searches, security options and retention policies. They are competent in executing monthly exports and reporting.
fa7f8328-f3d5-4704-8e1b-7d9a9a75b9c2.name: Smarsh Certified Professional Archive Administrator

048ea0f6-84b4-461b-bc1e-57f09d29a32a.description: Earners of the Data Science Specialist designation have a fundamental understanding of the Cognition Studio interface, they have developed the skills required to create and evaluate lexicons, models and label sets. They have the skills required to ensure the system flags violations and minimized false positives.
